Class LinkedStack<T>

java.lang.Object
LinkedStack<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
StackInterface<T>
public final class LinkedStack<T> extends Object implements StackInterface<T>
A class of stacks whose entries are stored in a chain of nodes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LinkedStack()
    Default size of constructor is set to 0.

  • Constructor Details

    • LinkedStack

      public LinkedStack()
      Default size of constructor is set to 0.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Get amount of nodes in the Linked Stack
      Returns:
      Returns the size of the stack. Currently size++ is part of push() and size-- of pop(). the constructor sets the default to 0.

    • push

      public void push(T newEntry)
      Adds a new element to the top of the stack.
      Specified by:
      push in interface StackInterface<T>
      Parameters:
      newEntry - is the new element to be added.

    • pop

      public T pop()
      Removes the element on the top of the stack
      Specified by:
      pop in interface StackInterface<T>
      Returns:
      The object at the top of the stack.
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException() - if the stack is empty when the method is called.

    • peek

      public T peek()
      Returns the element on the top of the stack
      Specified by:
      peek in interface StackInterface<T>
      Returns:
      The object at the top of the stack.
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException() - if the stack is empty when the method is called.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if there is anything in the top node
      Specified by:
      isEmpty in interface StackInterface<T>
      Returns:
      If true that it is null, then it is empty, if false then there is at least one element
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException() - if the stack is empty when the method is called.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      If it returns that it is not empty, it will continue running pop() until it is empty.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface StackInterface<T>
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException() - if the stack is empty when the method is called.

    • convertToPostfix

      public String convertToPostfix(String infix)
      Algorithm to sort through a infix operation and turn it into a postfix operation using the previously created LinkedStack methods
      Parameters:
      infix - Inputs a String infix operation
      Returns:
      Returns a converted postfix operation
